pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 24, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

New York, New York

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the opening of the Nelson Mandela Peace Summit.

General Assembly Hall, Second Floor
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with Prime Minister of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal Khadga Prasad Oli.

Room 1520, 15th Floor
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Nelson Mandela Peace Summit.

General Assembly Hall, Second Floor
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the United Nations Secretary-General’s High-level Meeting on Financing the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development.

The Economic and Social Council Chamber, Second Floor
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with Prime Minister of Barbados Mia Mottley.

Room 1520, 15th Floor
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a leaders’ roundtable on girls’ education.

Conference Room 9
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the roundtable
